summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Al-Ghazaly Auto Parts API. All endpoints that were fixed to return 403 (Access denied) instead of 405 (Method Not Allowed) or 404 (Not Found) are working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/admins - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
POST /api/admins - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
DELETE /api/admins/{admin_id} - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
GET /api/subscription-requests - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
POST /api/subscription-requests - Accepts subscription request data without authentication
PATCH /api/subscription-requests/{id}/approve - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
GET /api/analytics/overview - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
GET /api/subscribers - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
PATCH /api/customers/admin/customer/{id}/orders/mark-viewed - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
DELETE /api/customers/{id} - Returns 403 (Access denied) for unauthenticated requests
GET /api/car-brands - Returns 200 with car brands list (public endpoint)
GET /api/products - Returns 200 with products list (public endpoint)
